name: Silveines, Sylvan Protector
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or Deck while there are 5 or more "Sylvan" monsters in your GY. You can only Special Summon "Silveines, Sylvan Protector" once per turn. (Quick Effect): When a monster effect is activated: You can Tribute a face-up Plant-Type monster; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that monster. You can only activate this effect of "Silveines, Sylvan Protector" once per turn. If this card is excavated from the Deck and sent to the GY by a card effect: You can shuffle this card back into the deck; add 1 "Sylvan" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your hand.
